title: Scripts with flourishes
content:
I am fairly new to scripts and flourishes. I find them extremely fun to work with, even though I am uuber new to the craft.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418231810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newnessoflife_3727.png)

Please share your most despotic of critiques.

Thanks!

Evan

[http://evanmade.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418231810/http:/evanmade.com/)
author: evanmacdonald
